detroit.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Corktown, New Center, Greektown, Southwest Detroit
detroit.meetingHighlights: Diverse metro meetings with strong recovery community in Corktown and Midtown; many Spanish-language and specialty meetings across neighborhoods.
detroit.transitInfo: DDOT buses and QLine streetcar serve Detroit; Detroit Metro Airport (DTW) is a major hub nearby.

ann-arbor.areaDescription: Ann Arbor area, home to University of Michigan
ann-arbor.neighborhoods: Downtown, Kerrytown, Old West Side, Burns Park, North Campus, South University
ann-arbor.meetingHighlights: College-town meetings with active young people's groups near U of M campus; progressive fellowship with diverse meeting options.
ann-arbor.transitInfo: TheRide (AAATA) provides comprehensive bus service throughout Ann Arbor and Washtenaw County.

flint.meetingHighlights: Strong community meetings with focus on service and outreach; active recovery groups in Carriage Town and near University of Michigan-Flint.
flint.transitInfo: Flint MTA provides bus service throughout Genesee County; Bishop International Airport (FNT) offers regional flights.

lansing.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old Town, REO Town, Eastside, Westside, Near Southside
lansing.meetingHighlights: State capital meetings with diverse options around government center and Michigan State University campus; active Big Book study groups.
lansing.transitInfo: Capital Area Transportation Authority (CATA) provides extensive bus service; Lansing Capital Region International Airport (LAN) offers regional connections.

grand-rapids.neighborhoods: Downtown, East Grand Rapids, Heritage Hill, Knapps Corner, Creston, South Hill
grand-rapids.meetingHighlights: Strong West Michigan fellowship with meetings throughout metro area; active Heritage Hill and downtown recovery community.
grand-rapids.transitInfo: The Rapid provides comprehensive bus service throughout Kent County; Gerald R. Ford International Airport (GRR) is nearby.

dearborn.neighborhoods: East Dearborn, West Dearborn, South End, Springwells Park, North Dearborn
dearborn.meetingHighlights: Diverse meetings serving metro Detroit area; culturally inclusive fellowship with Arabic-speaking meetings available.
dearborn.transitInfo: DDOT and SMART buses serve Dearborn; Detroit Metro Airport (DTW) is nearby in Romulus.

kalamazoo.meetingHighlights: Active college-town meetings near Western Michigan University and Kalamazoo College; strong downtown recovery community around Bronson Park.
kalamazoo.transitInfo: Kalamazoo Metro Transit provides bus service throughout the city; Kalamazoo/Battle Creek International Airport (AZO) nearby.
